Comments_List: The bureaucracy of the film industry in the US.

While taking this course, I couldn't help but think that it would have been much more conducive for learning as an in-person course rather than an online course. It was a seminar, but online it was near impossible to effectively participate or discuss course topics. The information we learned was rather interesting and thought-provoking, but I found myself reluctant to participate because of the clunky technological obstacles.
Blank background on the provided powerpoints. The material on them was great, but impossible to read unless you replace all 100 slide backgrounds individually.
